text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump The Food and Drug Administration withdrew its emergency use authorization for hydroxychloroquine and a related drug that President Trump promoted for treatment of covid-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus. I guess we won’t see Kayleigh the Liar mention this!
